pages.title: Swiftness
pages.text: Swiftness is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#389fff)$(l)essence of speed and agility$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to increase their movement speed with each successful hit.

Swiftness is a powerful runic power that can give the wielder a significant advantage in battle. $(br2)It's ideal for characters that rely on mobility and speed, such as rogue, ranger, and monks, who can use the power to outmaneuver their enemies and strike quickly.
